long_description: Let the Pacsafe Citysafe 200 GII petite handbag with anti-theft features make your travels a little less worrisome-its classic, yet contemporary style looks good, too! RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Features eXomesh(R) slashguards: lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh is built discreetly into vulnerable areas to prevent thieves from slashing through the fabric. Flexible, lightweight stainless-steel wire is integrated into the adjustable carry strap to prevent bag slashers from slicing through and running off with your gear. Shoulder strap has a releasable security hook at one end that allows the strap to be attached to a fixture so no one can walk off with your bag. Tamperproof zippers fasten to concealed clips, making it hard for pickpockets to unzip and snatch your valuables. Zippered main compartment; zippered front stash pocket. Bright colored liner adds some fun and helps you easily locate what you need, when you need it; padded electronic pocket fits up to a 13 in. laptop. Pacsafe Citysafe 200 includes an internal electronics pocket, zip pocket, headphone port, pen holder and key clip.
short_description: Let the Pacsafe Citysafe 200 GII petite handbag with anti-theft features make your travels a little less worrisome-its classic, yet contemporary style looks good, too!
